description:
No superfluous features, no superfluous weight: the Merino Shield Ultra Light line is on alpine, lonely summits. The Piz Selva Shorts for men is the optimal companion for hot summer days - whether for a mountain sprint or an extensive mountain tour.

Thanks to its short cut and loose fit, the Piz Selva Shorts are ideal for men who move quickly in alpine terrain. At the same time, the line ensures high abrasion resistance of over 30,000 abrasion cycles in the Martindale test. Tasmanian merino wool is used in the elastic waistband, which feels pleasant on the skin and at the same time has a moisture-regulating effect. In addition, the two front pockets provide space for important small items.

The Piz Selva Shorts for men focuses on the essentials, so that even on hot days you can easily and casually reach any mountain peak.
name: Ortovox Piz Selva Shorts - Mens
